title: Corbin Goodwin & Mike Elterman
description:
Our guests today are the hilarious hosts from the new /DRIVE series, "Corbin's Hit Show", Corbin Goodwin and Michael Elterman. They are experts at turning cheap heaps into fast heaps. Their show is about making a cheap, used car as fast as its modern counterpart, using junk yard parts. In their first show they bought a 1984 Mustang SVO and got quite creative with it. 

Also in this show, Matt talks about travel, and Mustangs. Michael tells the story of bad steering modifications, and Corbin misses his evo.
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
